remarks: A mapping with value 0 except of one is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)
statement:
suppmptcfin.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
suppmptcfin.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) $.
suppmptcfin.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
suppmptcfin.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
suppmptcfin.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> if ( x = X , .1. , .0. ) ) $.
mptcfsupp $p |- ( ( M e. LMod /\ V e. ~P B /\ X e. V ) -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
$d .0. x $.
$d .1. x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d M x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
